cast.name: 克日什托夫·皮耶钦斯基 Krzysztof Pieczynski
Olivier De Sagazan Olivier De Sagazan

writer.name: 巴托斯·科诺普卡 Bartosz Konopka

director.name: 巴托斯·科诺普卡 Bartosz Konopka

introduction: A tale of two knights – experienced Willibrord and young, mysterious Unnamed, who set off to christen a small pagan village hidden deep in the mountains. Despite the differences in their worldviews and perspectives on religion, the two men become travel companions and create a somewhat father-son relationship. At the village, the pagans put the newcomers’ beliefs to a test. Soon, love is confronted with hate, dialogue with violence, madness with rules and many will have to die. Otter Films
